summary: As requested - a simple Argonian companion
descriptionHtml:
Dee-Jarin is a no frills, basic companion who is adept at one-handed weapons and archery.
He has a healing spell to heal himself when needed and his bravery is Brave.

In his picture, he is skinny, I have beefed him up abot but only to a above average build.

He can be found and his default home is the Argonian Assemblage in Windhelm as the bulk of Argonians can be found here.

Not currently marriable.

Please use this as a resource for other basic companions. More Argonian companions to come.
author: beth
